data.app_name: ULTRA REAL RUNNER: SPACE MISSION - OPTIMIZED
data.description:
Ultra Fun Games presents you a new type of game that will help you work out while you are playing it: ULTRA REAL RUNNER! 

This is an optimized version and it is recommended if you play it on a Quest 2, but it works on any headset. If you have a headset better than Quest 2, better to get the normal version.

Probably The First Fitness Game:

Where You Need to Both Run and Jump Physically!

Where You Have an Acceleration And Your Speed Increases While You Continue To Run So It Makes Cheating Almost Impossible!

That Has High Graphics!

That Has a Story!
 
That's Also an Escape Game!

Where You Can Hold Free Weights!

That Has A Sci-Fi Theme!
 
That Has Power-Ups!
 
That Makes You Burn Calories Much Faster Than A HIIT Workout!
Whose Story Will Link To Future Games!
 

3 Locomotion Modes Available:

*Feet Locomotion: you need to run stationary in order to run in the game. You don't need the controllers and you may carry weights in your hands for a better workout! You need to jump in reality in order to jump in the game! You can also use the joystick as well if you want to run backward at any time.

*Automatic: you move continuously in the direction you are facing but you need to jump in reality in order to jump in the game! You don't need the controllers and you may carry weights in your hands for a better workout!

*Joystick: you move continuously in the direction you are facing while you are holding the joystick button. You need to jump in reality in order to jump in the game!
